feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19 except minus 25 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 except minus 25 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
